#include<stdio.h>
#include<iostream>
using namespace std ;
char Arry[10000001],s[100001] ;
int main()
{
	int i,j,k,l,m,n,t,count,num ;
	bool got ;
	char ch ;
	count = 1 ;
	ch = getchar() ;
	Arry[count] = ch ;
	while(ch!='.')
	{
		ch = getchar() ;
		count += 1 ;
		Arry[count] = ch ;
	}
	num = count - 1 ;
	//count += 1 ;
	//Arry[count] = ch ;
	i = 0 ;
	while(i<=num)
	{
		j = 1 ;
		i++ ;
		while((Arry[i]>=48 && Arry[i]<=57)||(Arry[i]>=65 && Arry[i]<=90)||(Arry[i]>=97 && Arry[i]<=122))
		{
			ch = Arry[i] ;
			s[j] = ch ;
			j++ ;
			i++ ;
		}
		j-- ;
		while(j>=1)
		{
			printf("%c",s[j]);
			j-- ;
		}
		printf("%c",Arry[i]) ;
	}
	printf("\n");
	return 0 ;
}
